name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.interaction.worker.await.promptEditor
script:
start:
  await/setup:
    form:
      title: Prompt with a code editor:
      elements:
        text/prompt_label:
          label: Label:
          default: Enter code:
          required@bool: yes
  
        sheet/prompt_syntax:
          label: Syntax:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            cerb_query_data:
              mode: cerb_query_data
              name: Cerb Data Query
            cerb_query_search:
              mode: cerb_query_search
              name: Cerb Search Query
            html:
              mode: html
              name: HTML
            json:
              mode: json
              name: JSON
            kata:
              mode: kata
              name: KATA
            markdown:
              mode: markdown
              name: Markdown
            text:
              mode: text
              name: Text
            yaml:
              mode: yaml
              name: YAML
          default@list:
            cerb_query_data
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: no
              style: grid
            columns:
              selection/mode:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/name:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
  await/default:
    form:
      elements:
        editor/prompt_default:
          label: Default:
          mode: {{prompt_mode}}

  return:
    snippet@text:
      editor/prompt_{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        label: {{prompt_label}}
        syntax: {{prompt_syntax}}
        {% if prompt_default -%}
        default@text:
          {{prompt_default|indent('    ', 2)}}
        {% endif -%}
